p: To complement syndromic surveillance, a subset of GPs in the RCGP RSC submit respiratory samples from patients presenting in primary care with an ILI. These respiratory samples undergo virological testing to ascertain presence or absence of influenza viruses. Given not all patients reporting ILI are infected with an influenza virus, these virological sample positivity data yield the fraction of ILI reported primary care consultations that were attributable to influenza.
